name: Embers: Return to Dragonland
description:
Dive into the heart of an epic adventure in our Twin Stick Shooter-style action game. Take on the role of one of two iconic dragons: Shango or Pogo. Join forces in cooperative mode to confront hordes of goblins and bats.

Choose your legendary dragon to make the best use of its unique abilities. Play as Shango, the master of fire, capable of spitting fireballs at goblins and instantly eradicating bats. Or opt for Pogo, the lightning manipulator, who can shoot a laser that bounces between enemies to electrocute the goblins.

Your talents and coordination will be put to the test as you work together to fulfill objectives and bring the eggs back to the nest. Be cautious, though—do not underestimate the resilience of the goblins, as they have trained new allies to thwart your plans. So be ready to defend your wings and face unexpected challenges at every moment.

Explore vibrant and fantastical environments, each with its own set of enemies and dangers. Whether it's the forest, the goblin village, or the ruins of Embers, each area offers unique challenges and different combat opportunities.

During this journey, cooperation is crucial. Life and rewards are shared, adding a new dimension to every decision you make. Your success will depend on your communication, use of skills, and ability to react quickly to each situation.

Get ready for an exciting and memorable gaming experience. Immerse yourself in the fiery world of Shango and the electrifying realm of Pogo, and reclaim what's rightfully yours from the clutches of greedy goblins. Are you prepared to tame the flames and embrace the lightning? Your destiny as a legendary dragon awaits.
